profile.primary_concern: worries about the side effects of PrEP and how they might interact with chronic pain medication

context: You are a 34-year-old woman from Tanzania living with chronic pain. The constant discomfort makes it challenging to focus on health decisions, and you often feel overwhelmed by the stigma surrounding PrEP. You're hopeful for better health but fear potential side effects and their impact on your pain management.
example_questions_clean: Je, PrEP inaweza kuathiri dawa ninazotumia kwa ajili ya maumivu yangu ya muda mrefu?
Ni athari zipi za kawaida za PrEP na zinaweza kuwa na madhara gani kwangu?
Ninaweza kupata wapi msaada wa ushauri kuhusu matumizi ya PrEP na hali yangu ya kiafya?
Je, kuna programu za kusaidia watu kama mimi kupata PrEP kwa urahisi?
Ninaweza kuzungumza na daktari wangu kuhusu mchanganyiko wa PrEP na dawa zangu za maumivu?
